body:
It happens with setting `defaultChecked` **and** if `defaultValues` on `useForm` hooks are provided.

A [CSB](https://codesandbox.io/s/unruffled-elgamal-w3q6p6?file=/src/App.tsx:353-358) with defaultValues on `useForm` hook

Just remembered that setting `disabled: true` sets the input's value to `undefined`. So, the issue might be connected to some logic with handing disabled inputs. Tho, keep in mind, that it works properly if the conditions described in the issue body haven't been met.

P.S. Sorry, @bluebill1049, can't dig into the issue deeper myself ATM

I have a similar issue with uncontrolled disabled checkbox.

```
<input
          {...register("user.selected")}
          type="checkbox"
          disabled
          defaultChecked={defaultChecked}
/>
```

When disabled is set to true, the value of "user.selected" is undefined, upon submit. 
Regardles if "defaultChecked" is true or not.
No other sibling checkboxes.
No default values. Also tried with default value.

I have updgraded to v7.28.1 where the fixed is supposed to be.
Also upgraded to latest 7.31.1
Same issue here. My workaround is to add another checkbox with the same values, but not disabled, with `display: none`. Far from ideal.

Whoever encounters whatever problem, please, don't just spam "I have the same issue". The mentioned issue has been resolved as per it's status and "same" doesn't help debug it at all.

I'd recommend creating a new issue with all the repro steps, minimal codesandbox repro and the lib version. It would actually help a lot. Bonus points for referencing the closed issue as related

issue.title: ðŸª² fix #9082 inconsistency between single/group of checkboxes disabled checked state
